desc: HeliumGateways.com is an online reseller of Helium gateways, miners and accessories, based in Sweden. Currently stocking the long-awaited European version of Mimiq's FinestraMiner. Get yours now!

layout.text: FinestraMiner (E) is the long-awaited European version of Mimiq's high-performance, best-in-class LongFi™ hotspot for the Helium Network. It mounts seamlessly on your wall or window for enhanced coverage and optimal performance.
